title: Problems While Paying
body: Im having a problem while paying im trying to buy 50 dollars of RP in game and my card wont work i just bought this pre paid card and i setup a zip code but it just wont work and i tryed it on amazon and then i tryed it on league but it didnt work now i have to wait 24hours to buy can you please get ride of the timer so i can buy my RP.

replies.body: Hmmmmm it sounds like you've tried and failed too many times which is why you have the 24 hour waiting period, and FYI any more attempts will reset that timer as well. I'd suggest waiting the full 24 hours before trying anymore, and then double checking that you're putting the card info in the correct area and with all the right information. If it's still not wanting to work, hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can help walk you through the process!
Thanks for the help i guess i have to wait but its fine
